block.p: COUNTY SEAT STORES, Dallas, which has 740 casual clothing stores throughout the United States, filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection.

KAISER-FRANCIS OIL CO., Tulsa, Okla., increased its stake in Petrocorp Inc. of Houston to 48 percent, or 4.09 million shares, after buying 3.72 million shares. The stocks were bought for $8 to $8.25 a share.

SONIC CORP., Oklahoma City, which owns drive-in restaurants under the Sonic name, said it planned to open about 100 restaurants a year for the next several years through construction and acquisitions.
